'''Pierre Vanderweerd''' is an artist who specializes in character design, visual development and traditional 2D animation. He was born in the Netherlands and moved to Canada in [[2005]]. Pierre started drawing in [[2009]] fueled by all things whimsical and musical. He is currently working as a senior traditional animator in Montr√©al. He started a visual development project based on [[The Lord of the Rings]] to further develop his skills in character design, posing, rendering and more.  Not wanting to be influenced by the [[2001]]-[[2003]] [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|trilogy]] (which he loves,) he began by re-reading the books and drew his inspiration largely from there.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.pierrevanderweerd.com/projects/lotr|articlename=''The Lord of the Rings Project''|dated=|website=[http://www.pierrevanderweerd.com''Pierre Vanderweerd Official Website'']|accessed=8 August 2022}}</ref>
